const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case "active": return "text-green-600 bg-green-100 border-green-200"; case "completed": return "text-blue-600 bg-blue-100 border-blue-200"; case "pending": return "text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-100 border-yellow-200"; case "approved": return "text-green-600 bg-green-100 border-green-200"; default: return "text-gray-600 bg-gray-100 border-gray-200"; } }; const getStatusText = (status) => { switch (status) { case "active": return "Ativa"; case "completed": return "Conclu√≠da"; case "pending": return "Pendente"; case "approved": return "Aprovada"; default: return status; } }; return (
